code:
```verilog
module my_module (
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    input logic b,
    output logic q
);

logic state;

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        state <= 1'b0;
    end else begin
        state <= b ? 1'b1 : 1'b0; // Example condition based on input 'b'
    end
end

always @(*) begin
    q = state; // Combinational logic for output 'q'
end

endmodule
```
